Name: Black Chilli
t1b: Has a very spicy taste.
t2b: Creates a rare spice, that sells for 50g.

Name: Wild Rose
t1b: Intrinsically beautiful.
Flavour: Sometimes a flower is just a flower.

Name: Medical Leaves
t1b: Stabilizes an unconscious creature.
t2b: Creates a healing potion.

Name: Berry
t1b: Regain 1 hp.

Name: Fast-growing Ivy
t1b: Can be shaped into a hat.
t2b: Can be shaped into basic clothing.

Name: Carrot
t1b: Acts as daily ration of food.
t2b: A makeshift whistle.

Name: Sturdy Vine
t1b: Acts as 10 ft of rope.

Name: Crystal Flower
t1b: Your first roll after collecting this petal, has an additional +1 modifier.
Flavour: Life from stone should not exist. And yet...

Name: Gas-filled Pumpkin
t1b: Your voice becomes high-pitched (10 min.).
t2b: To attune a vial of this gas, it must be carried by a person for 1 day. Whoever inhales this gas, gets the voice of the attuned person (10 min.)

Name: White Lotus
t1b: A recognizing sign of a political or criminal organization (at DM's discretion).
t2b: The stem of this flower can be dried and sharpened into a small dagger.

Name: Shaking Chestnuts
t1b: Cures common cold.
t2b: An alchemistic ingredient that sells for 1g.

Name: Dry Thumbleweed
t1b: Each creature in the 60 ft. line must make a DC 12 Dex saving throw. A creature takes 2d6+3 fire damage on a failed save. Flammable targets ignite.
Event: A thumbleweed rolls past you. You may catch it with a DC 12 Dexterity skill check.

Name: Corpse Flower
t1b: Emits a subtle smell that can be tracked by dogs or trained trackers in a 10 mile radius (3 days).
t2b: Creates a rare spice, that sells for 50g.

Name: Bell Bush
t1b: Ten flowers that can be planted in an area. Stepping on them makes a loud sound (DC 14 Dexterity saving throw).
t2b: A bag of seeds that makes a loud noise when thrown, all creatures in 10 ft radius go deaf for 15 seconds.

Name: Animal Nip
t1b: +2 to animal handling (1 day).
t2b: The beast understands your verbal commands, but is not forced to follow them.

Name: Copycat Fertilizer
t1b: After a day this fertilizer transforms into any other plant. It must be used on the same day or it decays into nothing.
Flavour: Hope you don't mind the smell.

Name: Tea Leaves
t1b: Roll d4. On 4, recover one step of exhaustion. On 3, recover 5 hp. On 2, remember a childhood memory. On 1, fall asleep.

Name: Goodberry Bush
t1b: The branch can repeatedly expand into a bush or contract back to a branch on command. If hidden inside, +3 to stealth.
t2b: After a week, you can collect 1 goodberry (see Druid) per day. Bush lasts for 1 month.

Name: Four-leaf clover
t1b: After any roll, but before you know if it succeeds or fails, squish the four-leaf clover to add +1 to the result.

Name: Oily shrubbery
t1b: Cannot be grappled (1 hour).
t2b: Cannot be disarmed (1 hour).

Name: Dandelion Light
t1b: You float 5 feet above the surface. Your moving speed otherwise remains the same. (1 hour)
t2b: The Dandelion light raises high into the air and emits yellow light like a flare. (10 minutes)

Name: Spotted Mushroom
t1b: Roll DC 12 Constitution. On success become inspired by the dish, get advantage on the first roll you make in the next 30 minutes. On failure you have heavy digestion problems for the next 12 hours.

Name: 10 Feet Branch
t1b: Can be used as a 10 feet pole.
Flavour: An elegant weapon for a more civilized age.

Name: Good-Luck Lily Pad
t1b: When carried, it gives +1 to nature skill.
t2b: When doused with a special substance, enlarges into a boat that can carry one creature (medium or smaller). Loses previous benefit.

Name: Thorned Nectar
t1b: DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become aggressive against all targets. Lose any social restraint. (1 min)
t2b: When peeling receive 1d4 damage. All who inhale (10 feet radius) get Calm emotion cast on them.

Name: Nightshade
t1b: The next long rest can be 4 hour shorter.
t2b: In addition to the previous effect, gain darkvision for 4 hours.

Name: Homeopathic Mold
t1b: For the next day, become immune to poison.
t2a: Name a specific poison. Consume all charges.
t2b: Roll a DC 15 Con saving throw, on success become permanently immune to the named poison. Else become poisoned by it.

Name: Amortentia
t1b: +1 persuasion when talking to a creature attracted to your sex (1 hour).
t2a: Mixed with a hair. Potion. Consumed.
t2b: +5 to persuasion when talking to the person who owned the hair strand. (1 day)

Name: Tentacle Weed
t1b: Counts as a simple weapon that only the herbalist is proficient with.
t2b: DC 6 Dexterity to eat. If successful, you can breath underwater for 1 hour, else take 1d4 damage.

Name: Spreading Roots
t1b: Get +1 strength (1 hour).
t2b: Cast Spike growth spell.

Name: Living Ice Crystal
t1b: Emits dim light.
t2b: Emits bright light. Can be sold for 100g to collectors.

Name: Poison Leaves
t1b: DC 10 Constitution saving throw or inflicts poisonous condition that lasts for 1 hour.
t2b: Liquid with DC 15 Constitution saving throw or inflicts poisonous condition for X hours and Xd8 damage.

Name: Once-in-the-lifetime Pumpkin
t1b: On 18+ the pumpkin becomes a carriage, else it can be used as 10 food rations.

Name: Truffles
t1b: Gain 1d4 hp.
t2b: Create a dish that heals for 4d4 hp.

Name: Ghost Melon
t1b: +1 to hit and +1 damage to undead (24h).
t2b: You can see all undead in 60 ft. radius, even through walls. Make a Wisdom skill check, on 12 or lower, all undead in 60 ft. radius see you.

Name: Lightning Flower
t1a: Used as a spell casting component.
t1b: If the spell deals thunder/lightning damage, roll two additional dice of the same type.
t2b: Each 6 seconds, for 1 minute, a lightning hits the flower (if possible), dealing 1d12 to all creatures in 5 ft radius.
Event: As you touch the flower, a lightning bolt strikes you from the clear sky. DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d12 thunder damage.

Name: Pale-blue Flower
t1b: Naturally cold weather has no effect on you (1 day).
t2b: Resistance to cold damage (1 hour).
Event: When you tear the flower from its stem, your arm freezes and cannot be moved for 30 minutes.

Name: Salamander Flower
t1b: Your next 5 hits with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 fire damage.
t2b: The fire expands in size 3 fold in all directions. All touched by this fire receive 3d12 fire damage.
Event: As you approach the flower, a ring of fire erupts all around it, 10 feet in diameter. Touching it causes 1d8 fire damage.

Name: Half-White, Half-Black Flower
t1b: The next time you deal radiant damage increase it by d12. The next time you receive necrotic damage, reduce it by d12 (1 day).
t2b: The next time you deal necrotic damage increase it by d12. The next time you receive radiant damage, reduce it by d12 (1 day).

Name: Power-infused Thistle
t1b: Recovers one expanded level 1 spell slot.
t2b: Recovers one expanded level 3 spell slot.

Name: Harmonica Fruit
t1b: Casts Misty step.
t2b: Casts Gaseous form.

Name: Cryptic beans
t1b: Contains 5 beans in a pod. All who consume 1 bean can talk telepathically for 1 hour.

Name: Oak bark
t1b: A shield, + 3 AC.
t2b: A medium armor, AC 15 + Dex (max 2).

Name: Invasive Plant
t1b: If planted far from its native region, can quickly spread and if not controlled, overwhelm the local ecosystem.
t2b: Cast Entangle spell (3 charges).

Name: Tree of Paradise
t1b: In an hour after being planted, it grows 100 feet in height. After a month bears very rare fruits that can be sold for 1000g to certain collectors. The height and colors of the tree attracts (unwanted) attention of all sort of individuals.

Name: Hallucinogenic Mushroom
t1b: Your vision blurs. DC 10 Constitution saving throw or disadvantage on all rolls. Dispels on any damage taken. (1 hour)
t2b: Halucination begins. On DC 18 Wisdom, cast Commune spell. All other rolls automatically fail. Dispels on any damage taken. (1 hour)

Name: Soothing Petals
t1b: +4 against intimidation and fear effects (10 minutes).
t2b: DC 14 Constitution or the target immediately falls asleep (6 hours). Dispels on any damage taken.

Name: Euphoric Grapes
t1b: +8 to Charisma when doing public speeches (1 minute).
t2b: You have 3 d12 inspiration dies that you can use on any throw made by you or your allies (1 day).

Name: Corn of Doom
t1b: Looks like regular corn. If consumed attempt a DC 15 Constitution saving throw and take 6d6 fire dmg on failure.
t2b: If ignited, the corn explodes, dealing 6d6 to all creatures in a 5 feet radius and half the damage to all creatures in 10 feet radius.

Name: Night Tulip
t1b: Removes one point of exhaustion.
t2a: Alchemy kit (3 days). Inhaled (10 ft range)
t2b: Attempt a Constitution saving throw. On less than 18, fall asleep, on less than 14 forget all events of the past hour.

Name: Head in the Clouds
t1b: Gain Flying. Roll (Int) with an extra -5 modifier, then your Int stat becomes the result of the roll. Repeat for Wisdom and Charisma. (10 minutes)

Name: Strawman Bush
t1b: Repels away (30 ft) all wild beasts of CR 3 or less.
t2b: Strawman awakens into a friendly NPC with the Guard stat block. It obeys all verbal commands. After 1 day it becomes a plant again.

Name: Heart of the Forest
t1b: Each contains a 200g gem inside them.
t2b: They can help you with directions and lore of the current area.
Event: When you try cutting a branch, the tree starts to move. You become surrounded by 2 Treants, that use their first action to awake 1 tree each (see Monster manual). They are aggressive towards you, claiming you are destroying the forest. You may flee, fight or negotiate.

Name: Tear of a Goddess
t1b: Cures blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or petrified.
t2b: You gain Supreme healing potion.

Name: Charcoal-Black Plant
t1b: Cures any poison.
t2a: Combined with Tear of the goddess.
t2b: You gain Supreme healing potion.

Name: Tree of the Living Death
t1b: You appear dead to all outward inspection and to spells used to determine your status. You are blinded and incapacitated. (6 hours)
t2b: Potion. After exactly 6 hours, if the creature that consumed this potion has 100 hp or fewer, it dies with no discernible signs.

Name: Fevered Dream
t1b: If willing, transform into a random beast for 10 minutes (DM chooses).
t2b: All creatures in 30 ft radius that inhale the smoke make DC 15 Wis saving throw or transform into random beasts (10 min).

Name: Blood Algae
t1b: +3 to hit and +3 to damage against demons and devils (1 hour).
t2a: Draw ritualistic signs on the floor
t2b: Make an Int skill check. On 12 or more a random hostile demon appears. On 18 or more it obeys your orders for a day.

Name: Scrying Beans
t1b: Get 3 divination dies for the rest of the day (look up Divination wizard - Portent).
t2b: Cast Scrying spell.

Name: Assimilation Plant
t1b: Your skin hardens and thorns cover your body. Choose two effects from the list: +3 AC, +7 stealth in forest areas, +2 damage on melee attacks, melee attackers get hit for 1d6 when they hit you, advantage on concentration checks, +2 strength. (1 hour)

Name: Neck Breaker
t1b: Wherever the plant is currently planted it emits the Hallucinatory Terrain effect centered around it (of the herbalist choice). The plant can be moved and replanted at a different place.
Event: The Neck Breaker Plant grows out of a thin peak, surrounded by a 100 feet deep and 30 feet wide pit. The pit is invisible and appears as solid terrain. When this card is drawn make DC 18 Perception check or start falling in the pit.

Name: Immortal Lily
t1b: If unconscious on your turn, instead of death-saving throws, regain 1 hp (1 day).
t2b: You do not age for the next 25 years.
Event: You encounter a CR 17+ dragon (at DM discretion) that is not aggressive, but would defend the lily with its life.

Name: Bond Breaker
t1b: You are spiritually free of earthly bonds. You gain flying speed of 60 feet and cannot be charmed or frightened. You get +3 to Wisdom.
Event: To get the effect you must meditate under the tree. Roll d4. On 4 forget all your childhood memories, on 3 lose interest in any earthly possessions, on 2 abandon your life ambitions, on 1 you will never again feel happiness or sadness.

Name: Symbiotic Death
t1b: Your skin gets a slightly greenish hue. Once per turn, if a creature touches your bare skin, you may have it take Xd4+2 poison damage.
Event: An old inscription dares you to eat as many petals as you can in order to get an ancient power. Choose a number X and eat X petals. Take Xd12 + 3 damage. If this damage would make you unconscious, it kills you instead.

Name: Oceans Test
t1b: The sea considers you worthy. You gain swimming speed of 120 feet and can breath underwater. Most sea creatures (DM discretion) are friendly to you and can understand your verbal commands.
Event: A plant grows at the bottom of a 3000 ft. deep underwater fissure and is guarded at DM discretion. Your worthiness is proved by pulling it out of the rock (Strength check, DC 18).

Name: Thiefs Dream
t1b: Wood and stone obstacles that are up to 10 ft. thick appear transparent to you. You may freely walk through them, as long as you end your turn outside.
Event: You have tracked the general location of this plant, but it grows in the middle of a rock, with no visible outwards signs. Choose a spot (Wisdom skill check). A mining team (or similar) can excavate this spot in one day. If the result of the roll was 20 or higher, find the plant. Can be repeated each day.

Name: Giant Scales
t1b: You gain +2 to Strength, +2 to Constitution and +3 to all thunder damage dealt.
t2b: You gain +10 to movement speed, cannot be paralyzed or petrified and +3 to all thunder damage dealt.
Event: A pair of Storm Giants roam the area. On their backs grow rare scales that are rumored to be the source of their power. The path to their lair is marked with skulls of adventurers who tried to take them.

Name: Sturdy Undergrowth
t1b: Restore 1d4 hp when eaten.
t2b: An elementary snare for small animals.

Name: Snow Seeds
t1b: The first time you would be surprised in combat, negate the 'surprised' status and consume this plant (24h).
t2b: You may release this plant to summon a snowstorm that reduces visibility of all creatures in 30 ft. radius to 10 ft. (1 min).
Event: They pass by you, almost indistinguishable from snowflakes. Can only be captured by the most perceptive (DC 20 Perception).

Name: Ancient Root
t1b: Continually whispers secrets in a language no one understands.
t2b: A potion that can be used to gain 2d6 temporary hit points for 10 minutes.

Name: Warmth-Seeker
t1b: This flower always grows turned to the nearest fire, regardless of its distance. No effect after being collected.
Flavour: It doesn't point north, but you are not trying to find north.

Name: Enchanted Branch
t1b: Acts as a thrown dagger, dealing 2d4 cold damage on hit.
t2b: Acts as a sword dealing 3d6 cold damage on hit. Shatters on first miss, dealing 1d4 cold damage to the wielder.

Name: Red on White
t1b: For the next 24h you can only step on snow or fall unconscious (1 hour) failing to do so. You do not leave tracks, have +10 stealth, and any melee attacks against surprised creatures are automatically critical hits.
Flavour: It requires both blood and snow to grow. Fortunately, its life cycle provides both.
Event: When attempting to collect the thorny flower, make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw and take 3d12 damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Name: Mirror Moss
t1b: Your hand can cross the moss into its own pocket dimension. You may place a non-magical object (or up to 100 gold) into it. A day later you may retrieve two copies out it. The moss is destroyed in the process.
Event: The moss reflects your image. After a few seconds the image emerges with the player's exact stats, hostile, and controlled by the DM. It returns to moss if not defeated.

Name: Eternal Blizzard
t1b: The snowstorm stops. You become immune to cold damage.  Whenever you are attacked by a non-magical source while standing in the snow, you may use your reaction to evade it. When doing so, your body melts into the snow and re-appears from snow in an un-occupied spot in 10 ft radius.
Event: There is a 1 sq. mile region always covered in snowstorms. Any creature within it gets visibility reduced to 5 ft and takes 1d4 damage at the end of each of their turns. Any spot within is equally likely as the plant location. There may be monsters hiding in the storm (at DM discretion).

Name: Parasite Mushroom
t1b: At the end of each day make a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw and get 3 points of exhaustion on failure.
t2b: Until removed, all other Wisdom saving throws automatically succeed. Previous effect still applies.

Name: Firewood
t1b: Ignites easily, burns for a long time.

Name: Cached Nuts
t1b: Serves as one food ration.
Flavour: A feast for some. Famine for others.

Name: Dark Leaves
t1b: Bitter taste, but can be chewed for hours.

Name: Exploding Pinecones
t1b: Throw an additional d4 when making the ranged attack. On 4, pinecone deals 2d4+2 damage on hit, and ignites the target. On 3, it deals 1d4+1 on hit. On 2, deals 1 damage. On 1, it explodes in your hand, dealing you 1d4 damage.

Name: Northern Evergreen
t1b: Your hair and facial hair grow with five times their natural speed.
t2b: A potion widely regarded as a cure for baldness that can be sold for up to 5g. The alchemy guild classifies it as a scam.

Name: Snow-White Blossom
t1b: The next time you would fail an Int or Wis saving throw you succeed instead (6h).
t2a: Applied on skin immediately after collecting.
t2b: The next time you would fail a Str or Con saving throw you succeed instead (6h).
